page.title: 09Pastimes
page.content: A class survey of playground games revealed this result: Hopscotch - 2 votes, poison - 3 votes, Rejects - 4 votes, headers - 6 votes. Hopscotch - for 2 - 4 players. Usual rules. Headers - make 2 goals about 5 metres apart. Head the ball and try to score. If you head it straight from an opponent's header you get to home from halfway. Poison- for 5-10 players. You have to hit a target with a ball. The cather shouts "Poison" and everyone has to stand still below the waist. If the catcher misses a person he is out. The last one out is the winner.
